name: Jason Park
summary: Experienced Fitness Director and operations professional with a background in security, executive protection, and client services. Proven ability to manage training staff, oversee payroll, enhance revenue, and develop programs while maintaining safety and compliance.

experience.title: Fitness Director
experience.description: Manage 11 Personal Training Staff ensuring facility offers high-safety, effective training; develop diverse training programs. Draft and submit payroll for 11 training department employees bi-weekly. Conduct monthly training groups to ensure policy compliance. Sell club memberships and personal training services. Achievements: Increased monthly revenue to $32,000; promoted to Fitness Director within 90 days; first month as Fitness Director produced $77,800 in personal training sales, surpassing a $45,000 goal by $32,800.

experience.title: Manager / Safety Advisor
experience.description: Entrusted with keys and security codes for opening/closing store; trained new employees on daily operations; managed reservations for surf lessons; coordinated tour ground demonstrations; practiced water safety and maintained CPR qualification; provided basic first aid for minor injuries.

experience.title: Aviation Warfare Systems Operator
experience.description: 783 hours flight time as Tactical Helicopter Aircrewman; door gunner; anti-submarine warfare systems; airborne radar/sensor operator; awarded for top performance in Search and Rescue; featured in FUTURES Magazine and Today's Military; completed Special Operations Pipeline.

experience.title: Diamond Jeweler / Executive Protection
experience.description: Sales of diamonds, rare gemstones, sunrise shells, and Royal Hawaiian jewelry; provided personal security during transportation of valuables; assisted startup and grand opening of Jason Park Diamond.

experience.title: Executive Assistant to CEO / Ambassador
experience.description: Schedule meetings, coordinate travel for 1-7 personnel; assist with daily operations; contributed to Waikiki Welcome Center economic tour trolley development; maintenance manager for 108 tour buses; ensured decals/insurances and compliance with tourism regulations; oversaw 18 tour drivers ensuring TWIC, CDL, medical and legal clearances; coordinated tour routes/schedules; liaised with other tour companies; prepared breakfast boxes for 150-300 morning tours.

experience.title: Sales Representative / Model
experience.description: Sales of brand men's Aloha shirts; opened/closed store; cashier/trainer; inventory management and quality control; modeled attire and featured on display poster.
